summary: A chronicle of the life of Yasui Santetsu, a 17th century master of go who turned his attention to astronomy and created a new calendar for Japan.
cast: Shôta Sometani|Aoi Miyazaki|Jun'ichi Okada|Ittoku Kishibe|Kiichi Nakai|Dai Watanabe|Takashi Sasano|Ryûta Satô|Yasunari Takeshima|Yu Tokui|Ennosuke Ichikawa IV|Ken Aoki|Keiji Mutô|Somegorô Ichikawa|Hideyuki Kasahara|Tokuhisa Yamashita|Kitarô|Akira Shirai|Yû Yokoyama|Kôshirô Matsumoto|Yukimi Koyanagi|Ryuhei Higashiyama
title: Tenchi meisatsu
